name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 18, Taiwanese people launched a protest against the Kuomintang legislators' proposal to cut the national defense budget.
KMT legislators Ma Wenjun and Huang Ren proposed to completely delete the annual follow-up budget for the Haikun-class submarine next year.
Defense Minister Gu Lixiong said today: If the budget is deleted next year, it will not be included until 2017, and the process will be delayed by 2 years. In the future, we will continue to communicate with the legislators.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Regarding everyone's concerns, I will further explain here.
In terms of the distribution structure, the project party holds a total of 25.8%, of which the Snowflake Foundation holds 19.5% for team operations and support for other teams.
Team members get a total of 4%, and I personally hold 2%.
I promise that the foundation will only sell tokens based on the team's operating costs and will not sell them at will. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Chinese companies were exposed to layoffs:
Jiyue Automobile was exposed to layoffs and disbanding, and employees surrounded CEO Xia Yiping and demanded that he pay social security for employees.
FAW Jilin stopped production for several months and owed employees several months of wages. The company owed 3.358 billion yuan and was insolvent.
Porsche China was exposed to layoffs: compensation N+6.
Internet rumor "Mengniu Dairy will lay off 6,000 people to save costs"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Food safety incidents exposed in China in 2024: (incomplete statistics)
In early July, the Beijing News exposed a food safety scandal involving oil tankers transporting cooking oil, which was also the most serious food safety crisis in mainland China since the melamine-tainted milk powder incident in 2008.
----------------------------------------------------------
December:
On December 1, it was reported that the hairy crabs exported from China to Taiwan were found to contain excessive dioxin.
On December 9, it was reported that the ice cream of the mainland restaurant "Fufuland" in Hong Kong Jiulongpo branch was found to contain 689 times more E. coli per gram
On December 11, it was reported that an employee of a food company in Hangzhou reported that the company used moldy prunes to process candied fruit.
On December 16 (report), Zigong, Sichuan. The suspect Huang and three others...
fullContent:
2024年中国被曝出的食品安全事件合订本：(不完全统计)
 7月初，新京报曝光一起油罐车运送食用油的食品安全丑闻，也是2008年三聚氰胺毒奶粉事件后中国大陆最严重的一起食品安全危机。
----------------------------------------------------------
 12月： 
 12月1日报道，中国出口台湾的大闸蟹被验出戴奥辛超标。 
 12月9日报道，内地餐厅「Fufuland」香港九龙坡分店的雪糕被验出大肠杆菌每克超标689倍
 12月11日报道，杭州一食品公司员工举报，公司使用发霉西梅加工蜜饯。
 12月16日(报道)，四川自贡。犯罪嫌疑人黄某等三人在出租屋用甲醛泡毛肚被抓。
----------------------------------------------------------
 11月：
 11月初，打假博主“松哥”举报良品铺子旗下的藕粉、酸辣粉配料表造假。
 11月23日报道，网友称在小孩喝的旺仔牛奶中，发现有疑似死老鼠的异物。
 11月29日，博主“老爸评测”发布报告，指出紫燕百味鸡大肠杆菌超标290倍。
----------------------------------------------------------
 10月：
 10月23日，中国出口欧盟的鸡蛋被检测出恩诺沙星含量超标。
 ---------------------------------------------------------
  9月：
  9月2日报道，央视曝光黑心商家用工业硫磺熏制枸杞。
  9月初，不少网友发现家里的月饼含有脱氢乙酸钠，该防腐添加剂长期食用会造成肝脏损伤。
----------------------------------------------------------
 7月：
 7月16报道，香港消委会测出内地售卖的农夫山泉和百岁山矿泉水溴酸盐超标。
----------------------------------------------------------
 6月：
 6月17日，山东滨州雅士亨鸭肠车间环境脏乱差，现场令人作呕。
----------------------------------------------------------
 3月：
 3月15日，央视315晚会曝光：安徽阜阳黑心厂家用劣质槽头肉制作梅菜扣肉。
----------------------------------------------------------

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 18, a netizen posted a post to commemorate a medical worker who died on the front line due to overwork during the epidemic.
She was not only a medical worker, but also a great mother. At present, her child has become a family member of a martyr and enjoys a monthly state allowance of 2,800 yuan until graduation from university.
The netizen replied, "So it was not the virus that killed the mother, but she died of exhaustion from not resting for 70 days, right?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A collection of food safety incidents in China in 2024: (incomplete statistics)
In early July, the Beijing News exposed a food safety scandal involving oil tankers transporting cooking oil, which was also the most serious food safety crisis in mainland China since the melamine-tainted milk powder incident in 2008.
----------------------------------------------------------
December:
On December 1, it was reported that Chinese hairy crabs exported to Taiwan were found to contain excessive levels of dioxin.
On December 9, it was reported that ice cream from the Hong Kong Kowloonpo branch of the mainland restaurant "Fufuland" was found to contain 689 times more E. coli per gram
On December 11, it was reported that an employee of a food company in Hangzhou reported that the company used moldy prunes to process candied fruit.
On December 16 (report), Zigong, Sichuan. The suspect Huang and three others...

----------------------------------------------------------
 10月：
10月16日，家长发现昆明云子中学食堂提供变质发臭的肉给学生食用。 
10月23日，中国出口欧盟的鸡蛋被检测出恩诺沙星含量超标。
 
 ---------------------------------------------------------
  9月：
  9月2日报道，央视曝光黑心商家用工业硫磺熏制枸杞。
  9月初，不少网友发现家里的月饼含有脱氢乙酸钠，该防腐添加剂长期食用会造成肝脏损伤。

----------------------------------------------------------

 6月17日，山东滨州雅士亨鸭肠车间环境脏乱差，现场令人作呕。
----------------------------------------------------------
 3月：
 3月15日，央视315晚会曝光：安徽阜阳黑心厂家用劣质槽头肉制作梅菜扣肉。
 3月17日报道，有商家用鸡骨泥代替鸡肉，制作淀粉肠。
----------------------------------------------------------
